features: 【Latest Bluetooth 5.2 & Effortless Pairing】Kurdene wireless earbuds with advanced bluetooth 5.2 technology owns fast and stable transmission without tangling, which makes the Bluetooth earbuds connect to electronic devices more consistently, providing you with an uninterrupted calling and music experience and Noise cancellation.These bluetooth earphones would instant paired once taken out from the charging case and auto connects with the last-paired device.

【Immersive Stereo Sound with long Lasting Barttery Life】Adapting powerful 8mm Neodymium magnet, kurdene S8 bluetooth earbuds provides pure balanced audio and clarity output for all music genres with loud sound, rich bass, clear midrange, balanced treble and high definition. A single charge gives you a full 6 hours of listening, while the charging case extends that to 38 hours. Enjoy your earbuds the entire day, without missing a beat.

【Customizable Fit for Comfortable Wearing】Every surface that touches your ear is made of liquid Silicone-not hard plastic(M size is installed, 6 pairs of different shapes of Ear Caps with size S/ M/ L for option for a customizable fit). The liquid silicone nozzle spreads pressure evenly across your ear for comfort, stability, and passive noise blocking. Giving you a fit for all-day comfort with less fatigue

【IPX8 Waterproof & Sweatproof】With an IPX8 rating, this wireless earbuds are resistant to sweat, water and rain. S8 wireless earbuds can endure and work flawlessly under different weather conditions. There’s nothing holding you back from running through the storm or sweating out your new personal best in the gym.(Please note: The charging case is not waterproof)

【Convenient Buttonless Touch Control】Features with capacitive touch interface, Kurdene S8 can largely minimize the pressure to your ears when you touch the button for various functions.Control your playlist without reaching in your pocket: Skip songs, launch music and answer calls simply by tapping your buds, so you can stay in the moment.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Amazing High Sound Quality Kurdene S8 provide powerful bass( lowest 20Hz), mellow midrange,and clear treble(up to 20kHz). A powerful 8mm neodymium magnet and moving coil speaker achieves balanced audio and clarity for all music genres.Reappearing every detail of the music vividly. S8 loud volume bluetooth earbuds with high-quality composite diaphragm moving coil unit and SBC/AAC high-quality audio decoding, which has been heavily tuned by a professional tuning team to increase the depth of deep bass diving and enhance the stability of mid-to-treble sounds, and efficiently restores the authentic sound quality. Enchanced Bluetooth 5.2 Adopt the latest Bluetooth 5.2 technology(2022),Kurdene S8 support HSP,HFP,A2DP,AVRC and SBC/AAC high-quality audio decoding,which ensures an ultra-stable fast seamless connection in a quick transmission speed. This is a long distance long range earbuds up to 10-30m away.Providing you with an ultra low-latency(<50ms) listening experience. Powerful Bluetooth 5.2 chip that's compatible with iphone,Android,Samsung galaxy S21,S22,S22Ultra,Windows,Notebook,Google pixel,Motorola,Oneplus,PC,MP3,MP4 and other Bluetooth enabled devices. Environmental Noise Cancelling for Clear Call （Not ANC） This wireless earbuds with microphones( 4 built-in mic),owning the single-mic neural network noise cancelling technology could maximally reduce wind noise, filter ambient noise, and transmit voice clearly in any noisy environment to ensure high quality clear crisp phone calls. You don’t have to raise your voice to be heard when you are in a noisy work environment such as sawing wood, mowing grass, taking the subway, bus, etc. And the person on the other end can hear you clear as a bell.

IPX8 Waterproof & Sweatproof IPX8 Waterproof Nano-coating efficiently protects the earbuds from the damage of the splash by sweat and raindrops. S8 wireless earbuds can endure and work flawlessly under different weather conditions. There’s nothing holding you back from running through the storm or sweating out your new personal best in the gym. Please note: The charging case is not waterproof and not for swimming. Long Lasting 38H Battery Life Kurdene S8 Bluetooth headphones with charging case owns the latest power battery system and technology,allowing you to listen to 6 hours of music of single charge and 32 hours of music with case.What amazing long lasting battery life!Enjoy fast charging, to fully charge the rechargerable case only less than1 hours via charging cable. Ultra Compact And Lightweight The wireless earbuds weigh only 4.5 grams and provide an excellent wearing experience that you won't feel discomfort even if you use them all day. Besides,the exquisite charging case weighs only 31.6 grams (equivalent to 2 AA batteries), which is convenient for you to easily put into your pocket.

PLEASE NOTE: Please remove the plastic film cover on the charging points of the earbuds and get them fully recharged before first use.The earbuds will not be disconnected and power off automatically when being put into the charging case if the case has no power.In this case, please charge the earbuds in time to ensure a better using experience.Please try to reset your earbuds if the two earbuds cannot be paired with each other or your devices.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 24, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Impressive Performance and Endurance - Kurdene S8 Bluetooth Wireless Earbuds Review
reviews.reviewText: I recently had the pleasure of trying out the Kurdene Bluetooth Wireless Earbuds, and they have left a lasting impression with their exceptional features. Here's why I consider them to be really good:Sound Quality:The standout feature of the Kurdene S8 earbuds is the deep bass sound they deliver. The audio quality is impressive, providing a rich and immersive listening experience across various genres. The balance between bass, mids, and highs is well-tuned, making these earbuds a delight for music enthusiasts.Wireless Connectivity:The Bluetooth connectivity on these earbuds is seamless. Pairing them with my device was quick and hassle-free. The stable connection ensures uninterrupted audio playback, and I experienced no lag while watching videos or listening to music.Comfortable Fit:The ergonomic design of the earbuds provides a secure and comfortable fit. They come with multiple ear tip sizes, allowing users to find the perfect fit for their ears. The snug fit not only enhances comfort during extended wear but also contributes to effective noise isolation.Long Battery Life:One of the standout features is the impressive 38-hour playtime. The earbuds themselves hold a substantial charge, and the included charging case provides additional power for extended use. This extended battery life is particularly useful for those who are constantly on the move.IPX8 Waterproof Rating:The IPX8 waterproof rating adds a layer of durability to these earbuds. They can withstand water immersion up to a certain depth, making them suitable for workouts, outdoor activities, and even unexpected rain showers. This feature enhances the versatility of the earbuds for various lifestyles.Call Clarity:The call clarity on the Kurdene S8 earbuds is commendable. The built-in microphones effectively pick up voices, and the background noise reduction ensures clear communication during phone calls.In conclusion, the Kurdene Bluetooth Wireless Earbuds (S8) offer a winning combination of impressive sound quality, comfortable design, long battery life, and durability. Whether you're a music lover, fitness enthusiast, or someone who values reliable wireless connectivity, these earbuds deliver on multiple fronts, making them a solid choice in the crowded earphone market. Highly recommended for those seeking a reliable and high-performance wireless audio solution.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 2, 2021
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Excellent entry level headphones: competes with up to 50 dollar models.
reviews.reviewText: These are a great product for the price. They work well and the sound quality is pretty good. I work at a concert venue, so I’ve been developing an ear for good sound.They are competitive to my girlfriend’s much more expensive wireless headphones. While one is not gunna get Bose quality sound, expecting it at this price point is just silly. These could have better bass and the “surround sound” is a little lacking, but I enjoy listening to audiobooks/dramas with them and can definitely notice a more theater like experience.If you youngsters need heavy bass for your hippity hoppity and that heavy drop on your electronic music, it will be average. Then again, one should just use regular speakers for that kind of bass heavy music.The battery life is good and the charging case is a good size for pocketing. I definitely like that It can hold multiple charges. Once the battery gets low, there is an audio message informing one of that. Just toss em into the charger on the first warning, as they will die very soon after and the repeated warning is annoying. Also one can see how much battery they have as an icon on ones phone (using IPhone SE gen 2).The headphones work as a pair or just in one ear. This is nice for being able to pay attention to my surroundings when I’m in a busier area or at night. With both in, they do a pretty good job of blocking outside noise. That works well when I’m wanting to tune out, but if one needs situational awareness it can be an issue.The touch sensitive “button” can be a little sensitive/finicky and I’m still getting used to it. Will note that since it’s spring here, there have been times when my hands have been wet or have gloves on, which may affect the experience. Even a light touch or brushing it by accident can pause your music.The microphone is good and my call quality has improved vs using my standard iPhone headphones. That’s due to them being in the earbud, so they are closer to the head vs depending on what you’re doing the wired headphones mic can be anywhere.Pro tip: make sure to put your earbud back into the case if you’re gunna just use one. Easy to lose otherwise.The fit is snug, with different sized ear buds for customization. I like that there are a good amount of sizes and two styles.Overall:These Kurdene Wireless headphones are a quality product at a reasonable price. It can be easy to spend a lot on headphones, these compete with ones up to 50 bucks. As long as one has reasonable expectations, they will be more than happy with these.Since it’s so easy to lose wireless headphones, I’m not ready to spend a lot on Bose or other premium brands.For what one could get in stores around the same price, the quality of these are much better. Everything I’ve seen for the price is significantly lower quality and one would need to spend closer to 35-50 to get a comparable product. These are made in China where costs are lower and therefore your money goes a little further. I do prefer to buy American made for high priced items, but when it comes to needing a solid entry level electronic item, one would be silly to not to get these. I spent a couple hours reading product reviews for wireless headphones, these were the best overall, especially for the price.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 19, 2023
reviews.reviewText: ive never used any other wireless earphones, so i cant really compare.these are pretty comfortable to wear, but if you scratch your ear you have to hold it in place or take it out first.there is a constant low hiss wether something is playing or not. once the volume is turned up you sort of forget about it until the media goes silent again.i like the touchpad style buttons.these arent marked right or left, instead the red ring is the right side, the blue ring is the left side. they come oriented in the small case, the case is marked right & left. this matters because the right side button turns up the volume & skips forward & left is vice versa.comes with spare silicon ear buds in different sizes, wish i could choose one size of spares because ill never use the giant or tiny buds.i really like that the case holds spare charge, but theres no way to tell the current status, youre just supposed to charge it every chance you get i guess.also no way to tell how much charge the earphones have left.i also like that the earphones are activated & ready to pair when theyre removed from the case, & deactivated when put back in the case.the bass effect is pretty good, they also get pretty loud as long as the source is a decent volume.im happy with them.edit: i had a problem with unsynced buds when pairing on pc, & it turns out that putting the buds in the charger doesnt reset the connection. in other words, they were still paired to my phone even after i turned my phones bluetooth off & had the buds charging. you need to tap both buds 4x quickly until the left but shows a purple led (just the red+blue led staying on together in the same hole). that will reset them. then you put them in the charger, then remove to pair to pc (or whatever else).
